com.devtence.will.dev.commons.mail

Class Mail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devtence.will.dev.commons.mail.Mail
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mailgun, StandardMail

    public abstract class Mail
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class created to serve as the base for all the mail service integration implementations.
    Since:
    2016-06-27
    Author:
    plessmann

      • sendMail

        public abstract void sendMail(java.lang.String sender,
            java.lang.String[] recipients,
            java.lang.String subject,
            java.lang.String message)
        Needs to be implemented to Send an email to an array multiple recipients.
        Parameters:
        sender - the mail origin
        recipients - a list of targets
        subject - subject of the mail
        message - the body of the mail

        public abstract void sendMail(java.lang.String sender,

        Needs to be implemented to Send an email to one recipient.
        Parameters:
        sender - the mail origin
        recipient - the target of the mail
        subject - subject of the mail
        message - the body of the mail
